newsitem.title: USA: Hyperion full 1997 net loss $30.5 mln.
newsitem.headline: Hyperion full 1997 net loss $30.5 mln.

text.p: Hyperion Telecommunications Inc said its net loss increased from a loss of $13,620,000 for the fiscal year ended March 31, 1996 to $30,547,000 for the current fiscal year.
The company said its fourth quarter results saw revenues increase 78 percent to $1,477,000 over the same quarter in the prior fiscal year.
The company said its fiscal 1997 results saw revenues increase 53 percent to $5,088,000 over the prior fiscal year.
Net loss increased from a loss of $3,757,000 for the three months ended March 31, 1996, to $11,500,000 for the same quarter in the current fiscal year, the company said.
Hyperion is an 88 percent owned subsidiary of Adelphia Communications Corp.
